item.title: XD first topic so what have they actually done?
item.dc:creator: @_1one_eleven1 !!1one!eleven1!
item.description:
@_1one_eleven1 wrote:

OMG I JUST GOT THE SOURCE IM A UBERLEET HACKER!!!

[code]RuneScape Game
body, td, p
{
font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;
font-size:11px;
}
body {margin:0px; overflow: auto;}
.b {border-style: outset; border-width:3pt; border-color:#373737}
.e {border:2px solid #382418}
.c {text-decoration:none}
A.c:hover {text-decoration:underline}

Main Menu 
<img border=0 src="http://www.runescape.com/lang/en/aff/runescape/img/gamewin/navbar_mainmenu.gif" style="vertical-align: middle">
<font color=white>World Select</font>

<font color=white>World Map</font>
Manual Rules & Security
[/code]

NOW WE CAN ALL MAKE BOTS AND LEECH!!

AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!! Hits self Rarghhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh1!1!!! Calm down Mason it’s ok… he just doesn’t know what he’s talking about… Ahhhhhh!! No… don’t scream… It will be ok.

We can’t get it that way because… viewing the scource code of the page is totaly different than deobfusticating Java code.

item.dc:creator: @qauters qauters
item.description:
@qauters wrote:

[quote=“nejat, post:17, topic:2928”]is Aryan gone?? NOOOO, Aryan was my brothers best friend, no kidding Aryan is a kurdish name
but seriously, is it possible to make a new version of SCAR so it doesnt take up ur mouse?? that would be a good thing, cause when i use SCAR no one can use the comp. :P[/quote]

Uhh, no! Scar is a macro program that clicks into the client. So, u have to use the mouse otherwise you need to hack the client. Like Aryan and that is sadly gone. So just try to making money other ways or use scar for something. Is better when u got more computers. It’s to bad Aryan is gone i was just making a program to run Aryan on school
